oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Buffer strips as filters for nutrients from grazed lands and nutrient cycling on the buffer strips
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Uusi-Kämppä, Jaana
Granlund, Kirsti
Palojärvi, Ansa
Rankinen, Katri
Regina, Kristiina
Valkama, Anna-Mari
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The retention of agricultural nitrogen and phosphorus by 10-m-wide grass buffer strips and buffers under natural vegetation has been studied for ten years on an experimental field at Jokioinen.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Uusi-Kämppä, Jaana; Granlund, Kirsti; Palojärvi, Ansa; Rankinen, Katri; Regina, Kristiina and Valkama, Anna-Mari (2003) Buffer strips as filters for nutrients from grazed lands and nutrient cycling on the buffer strips. Paper at: NJF's 22nd congress "Nordic agriculture in global perspective", Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
